photoswipe markup
Root element of PhotoSwipe. Must have class pswp.
Background of PhotoSwipe. 
         It's a separate element as animating opacity is faster than rgba().
Slides wrapper with overflow:hidden.
Container that holds slides. 
            PhotoSwipe keeps only 3 of them in the DOM to save memory.
            Don't modify these 3 pswp__item elements, data is added later on.
Default (PhotoSwipeUI_Default) interface on top of sliding area. Can be changed.
Controls are self-explanatory. Order can be changed.

About
navigation placeholders
Our Story: Graffiti American Burger BAr in Jacksonville Beach, FL
Welcome to Graffiti American Burger Bar! We serve 100% Angus Beef Burgers that are hormone and antibiotic-free, with just about any topping you could want! Our menu selections range from award-winning Wings, Flatbread, and Wraps to scrumptious Salads and killer Zucchini Fries!
Kick back in our casual neighborhood setting, full-service bar, and receive friendly service from our all-star staff. Enjoy the hand-painted graffiti on the walls and tables by local artists. Bring your family, co-workers, date, private parties, heck, even bring your dog (on the patio). Watch the big game on our multiple high-def TVs, or turn up your favorite tunes. At Graffiti American Burger Bar, we keep things simple. ~More gratitude and less attitude~ Good friends, good times, and great food!
Frequently Asked Questions
Where can I find a Graffiti American Burger Bar
265 5th Avenue N,
Jacksonville Beach, FL 32250
Located 3 blocks from the beach
I want to start working at Graffiti American Burger Bar. How do I do so?
We’re glad you want to be part of our team! Please come fill out our application form in person or on our Careers page.
What kind of food do you serve?
We only serve the best food in town. Whether you’re in for our famous fresh Burgers or our killer Zucchini Fries – we’re the place for you. Take a look at our full menu.
Does Graffiti American Burger Bar support any charities?
We believe in giving back to the surrounding community. Reach out to our General Manager to get involved
I want to keep up with Graffiti American Burger Bar!
If you want to keep up with us and learn about our new locations and specials, follow us on Facebook and Instagram.
Your burger can’t be THAT good!
Oh, but it is! Check out our awards to see a list of our recent awards – including multiple “Best Burger” awards!
Giving Back to the Community
Graffiti American Burger Bar supports many local charities. We give back to our surroundings for a better community and a better world.
Coalition for the Homeless of Central Florida
Our mission is to transform the lives of homeless men, women, and children by providing crucial services to end their crisis of homelessness.
Running For Brews
Running For Brews is for all those who enjoy getting out and breaking a sweat amongst other fellow runners and then topping it off with an awesome craft brew and some great conversation.
Base Camp Children’s Cancer Foundation
BASE Camp Children’s Cancer Foundation provides a year-round base of support for children and families facing the challenge of living with cancer and other life-threatening hematological illnesses.
Pet Rescue by Judy
Pet Rescue By Judy is a private, non-profit organization dedicated to the rescue of cats and dogs. We spay and neuter all of our animals. They also are given their required shots and examined by a Vet to make sure they have no health issues; if the animals have health issues, they are treated for those issues.
Relay for Life
Relay For Life is a fun-filled overnight event designed to celebrate survivorship and raise money for research and programs of your American Cancer Society. During the event, teams of people gather at schools, fairgrounds, or parks and take turns walking or running laps. Each team tries to keep at least one team member on the track at all times.
Knights of Columbus
The Knights of Columbus is a Catholic fraternal service organization that witnesses to its principles of charity, unity, and fraternity through spiritual and corporal works of mercy locally and globally. The Knights also promotes the Catholic faith through evangelization initiatives. It offers financial security to its members and their families through highly-rated financial products and services.
Runway to Hope
Runway To Hope raises funds and addresses the needs of the children and families impacted by pediatric cancer. We provide money for research, trials, equipment, and family assistance. In addition to lending our support and efforts to the needs of these children and families, we are dedicated to imparting a legacy that will inspire others to make a difference in the fight against pediatric cancer.
Brookshire Fund
The Brookshire Fund is organized exclusively for charitable and educational purposes. The Brookshire Fund is organized exclusively for one or more of the purposes as specified in Section 501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code. The purpose of the Brookshire Fund is to promote and support the educational causes of Brookshire Elementary School through fundraising charitable contribution efforts and to provide financial assistance to prioritized projects.
Pink Heals
We drive pink fire trucks and pink police cars across America, bringing the “Cares Enough to Wear Pink” and Pink Heals Movement to a city near you! We simply provide a program for your community leaders to adopt, helping them fundraise for people rather than causes. We focus our labor of love on the women of this country and wage war on anything that may harm her, starting with cancer!
Rally for the Cure
Susan G. Komen® is honored to benefit from Rally for the Cure®, presented by Condé Nast Rally for the Cure is a grassroots program that works to support Komen’s commitment to awareness as the first step in eliminating breast cancer through volunteer organized golf, tennis, and social events. Rally empowers people to support the mission of Susan G. Komen by spreading awareness in their community through an activity they are passionate about. – See more at:
Komen.org
Press and Awards
position relative
position absolute
ORLANDO’S BEST BURGER
October 9, 2023
I visit the Orlando area so much that it makes sense that I add this category. So here it is, what I believe are the 6 Best Burgers in the Orlando area, vote and one will take away a Best Orlando Burger Burger Beast Burgie Award (that was more than a mouthful) in early 2015.                                                                                                            Read The Entire Article
ORLANDO’S BEST BURGER – BEST OF ORLANDO 2014
October 9, 2023
Beth’s Burger Bar in downtown Orlando promises to be a late-night big kid’s diner. The restaurant features a highly-customizable build-a-burger website, dozens of import and domestic beer choices, and several wines. With a plethora of board games, bingo nights, beer pong, and daily food and drink specials, Beth’s Burger Bar aims to satisfy the kid inside all of us.                                                                                                            Read The Entire Article
GRAFFITI JUNKTION SET FOR EARLY APRIL OPENING ON CHURCH STREET
October 9, 2023
Greg Peters is staging an assault on the Central Florida restaurant scene and Church Street is next in his sights.                                                                                                            “We opened in Winter Springs a week ago, Dr. Phillips on Sunday, Church Street in three weeks and Lake Nona opens in five weeks,” said Peters, co-owner of Graffiti Junktion, about the company’s recent rapid expansion. “There were delays with the Church Street renovation, but once they were cleared up, everything happened at once.”                                                                                                            The casual, burger-centric eatery has been a staple of the downtown Orlando menu with its Thornton Park location. The company’s expansion to Church Street actually began in March 2014 with the more high-end Cafe Red concept. The venue closed about six months later.                                                                                                            Read The Entire Article
ORLANDO’S BEST BURGER
October 9, 2023
The burger. That slice of Americana that can be eaten anytime of the day, and anytime of the year.                                                                                                            It’s pretty hard to find a person that doesn’t enjoy a nice, juicy burger. It’s one of those comfort foods that not many Americans can live without, and rightfully so. It’s super easy to make, and you can pair the burger with anything. You can have it solo, or with cheese. You can add onions, bacon, or whatever your heart desires.                                                                                                            That’s what makes the burger such a perfect food item, and why in Orlando, great burger places are on every corner. There are too many great burger restaurants in Orlando, so let’s narrow it down to the top three best burger joints in Orlando. With these three, you will be in burger heaven!                                                                                                            Read The Entire Article
ORLANDO’S BEST SPORTS BAR – BEST OF ORLANDO 2014
October 9, 2023
We’ve all fallen into this trap. You excitedly enter your friend’s house to catch the big game, and lo and behold, the TV is tiny, there’s nowhere to sit, the beer is warm, and the food looks like it traveled 3000 miles to get there. Avoid the heartbreak, and visit one of these sports bars named the best in and around Boston by Orlando A-List voters.                                                                                     Read The Entire Article
GRAFFITI JUNKTION, PAPA MURPHY’S & MORE DEBUT NEW LOCATIONS IN CENTRAL FLORIDA
October 9, 2023
Orlando’s culinary scene is kicking off the New Year with several new locations of popular chains in the area, as well as a new opportunity for restaurant space in downtown Orlando.                                                                                     First up, Papa Murphy’s take-and-bake pizza concept will host a grand opening this weekend for its new Oviedo location. This will be the Vancouver, Wash.-based chain’s fourth location in Central Florida, including Apopka, Lake Mary and Ocoee. Central Florida franchisee Scottie Cahill says he plans to open additional locations this year.                                                                                     “The Orlando area has the right demographics for the Papa Murphy’s concept, and we’ll continue to build momentum through additional locations and enhanced advertising programs,” Cahill said in a prepared statement.                                                                                     Read The Entire Article
RATED #2 IN USA TODAY’S 10 BEST
October 9, 2023
Thornton Park Area’s Best Restaurants: This fun, local burger joint now has five locations around the city of Orlando, but Thornton Park is where it all started. Bold colors, bold burgers, great happy hours (early and late!) and a universally friendly atmosphere welcomes everyone from the young to the young-at-heart. And who doesn’t love a creative sandwich served alongside a cold beer? The entire place, inside and out, is ablaze with colorful art. Graffiti Junktion’s Thornton Park outpost sits right in the middle of the area’s tiny-but-charming business district, outdoor seating allows diners to soak up the atmosphere while scarfing down sweet potato fries. Win-win.                                                                                                            View Entire Article
BEST NON-CHAIN BURGER – BEST OF ORLANDO 2013
October 9, 2023
You might call them the class of 72: the winners of our annual Best of Orlando poll in six dozen categories.                                                                                                            Readers picked their favorites in everything from golf courses to tattoo parlors, TV news teams to theater, burgers to bloggers. So dig in!                                                                                                            Read The Entire Article
VOTED BEST CHILI – LAKE MARY CHILI COOK OFF
October 9, 2023
Graffiti Junktion’s Burger Bar location in Jacksonville Beach offers up mouthfuls.                                                      Now an Orlando-based chain wants to leave its mark on the local burger scene, too. Its quite literal about leaving marks.
MEATAHOLICS: HERE’S MECCA
October 9, 2023
Graffiti Junktion’s Burger Bar location in Jacksonville Beach offers up mouthfuls.                                                      Now an Orlando-based chain wants to leave its mark on the local burger scene, too. Its quite literal about leaving marks.
